oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb al-Sukkardān wa-ʻajāʼib al-buldān / taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah al-ʻUmda Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-shahīr bi-Ibn Abī Ḥajalah al-Tilimsānī : manuscript, 1567
Sukkardān wa-ʻajāʼib al-buldān
Sukkardān al-sulṭān
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn Abī Ḥajalah, Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá , 1325-1374 or 1375
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: الحمد لله الذي انطق الطير بحكمته واجرى البحار السبعة بقدرته ... وجعل مولانا السلطان سابع ... :Incipit
Written in a naskh hand in black ink, rubricated in red, 19 lines per page, with collation notes. There are catchwords on the verso of each leaf.
The ms is stained throughout ; text is slightly damaged on some pages.
According to colophon, copy completed on 14 Rajab 974 AH [January 24, 1567 AD] in the hand of Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān (?) ...
Foliated until fol. 63. Missing leave(s) after fol. 63.
Bound with: Ṭabaqāt al-aqṭāb fī dhikr awliyāʼ Allāh taʻālá wa-aqwālihim wa-aḥwālihim ilá intihāʼ ājālihim / Taqī al-Dīn al-Subkī (ff. 1r-169r).
MS Arab 357. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mamelukes
Egypt--History--Miscellanea

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: سكردان السلطان

سكردان وعجائب البلدان
